Player History
Won World Series with Boston in 1968...
Earned first career win on 7/13/1970...
Won World Series with Boston in 1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1976...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 2/20/1976 (Going to STL: 1B L. Durham. Going to CLE: C B. Benton)...
Injured on 6/12/1978 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Texas on 6/16/1978 (Going to STL: 2B R. Smith, 3B T. Perez, SS T. Harrah, P R. Moffitt. Going to TEX: 2B J. Castino, 1B L. Durham, CF D. Ford, P P. Falcone)...
Injured on 4/24/1981 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/20/1981 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1982, off Loyd Colson (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1982, off Marty DeMerritt (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1982, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1982, hitting .309 with 21 HR, 76 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1983, hitting .327 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 9/6/1983...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1984, hitting .320 with 8 HR, 25 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/23/1984...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/17/1984 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/5/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1989, hitting .379 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 7 hits with 7 RBI against Cleveland on 4/20/1989...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/23/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $751,000 per year...
